Ruby
code:
def factorial(n)
  n == 0 ? 1 : n * factorial(n - 1)
end
puts factorial(5)

name: C++
Swift
Kotlin
PHP
code:
<?php
function factorial($n) {
    if ($n == 0) return 1;
    return $n * factorial($n - 1);
}
echo factorial(5);
?>
